President and Project Director at COGERC: President and Project Director at COGERCO
paragraph1: REL Realty Advisors is a consortium of real estate professionals who have been collaborating successfully on various projects for nearly fifteen years. REL Realty Advisors focuses on resort development, master-planned amenity properties and residential communities. The founding partners have been involved in the real estate milieu of development, project management and commercialization for many years.
REL REALTY ADVISORS IS PROUD TO PRESENT: REL REALTY ADVISORS IS PROUD TO PRESENT ITS FIRST PROJECT
